pages.text: Redstone has evolved into cogs and gears powered by rotational power!
Grab some andesite, iron, and wood! Use these to make a basic water wheel with water pouring over it and you can now power your simplest creations! 'Ponder' on them to learn more.
This allows you to automate a million and one things as well as make some infinite resources, rail contraptions, auto-farms, and more. Imaginiation is the limit!
